head.title: W-8BEN-E Certificate of Status of Beneficial Owner for United States Tax Withholding and Reporting (Entities)

items.label: Go to www.irs.gov/FormW8 for instructions and the latest information. For full PDF version, go to https://www.irs.gov/pub/irs-pdf/fw8bene.pdf
Part I - Identification of Beneficial Owner
1. Name of organization that is the beneficial owner
2. Country of incorporation or organization
3. Name of disregarded entity receiving the payment (if applicable, see instructions)
4. Chapter 3 Status (entity type) (Must check one box only):
If you entered disregarded entity, partnership, simple trust, or grantor trust above, is the entity a hybrid making a treaty claim? If “Yes,” complete Part III.
5. Chapter 4 Status (FATCA status) (See instructions for details and complete the certification below for the entity's applicable status.)

options.label: Nonparticipating FFI (including an FFI related to a Reporting IGA FFI other than a deemed-compliant FFI, participating FFI, or exempt beneficial owner).
options.value: Nonparticipating FFI (including an FFI related to a Reporting IGA FFI other than a deemed-compliant FFI, participating FFI, or exempt beneficial owner).

options.label: Nonreporting IGA FFI. Complete Part XII.
options.value: Nonreporting IGA FFI. Complete Part XII.

options.label: Foreign government, government of a U.S. possession, or foreign central bank of issue. Complete Part XIII.
options.value: Foreign government, government of a U.S. possession, or foreign central bank of issue. Complete Part XIII.

options.label: Exempt retirement plans. Complete Part XV.
options.value: Exempt retirement plans. Complete Part XV.

options.label: Entity wholly owned by exempt beneficial owners. Complete Part XVI.
options.value: Entity wholly owned by exempt beneficial owners. Complete Part XVI.

options.label: Registered deemed-compliant FFI (other than a reporting Model 1 FFI, sponsored FFI, or nonreporting IGA FFI covered in Part XII). See instructions.
options.value: Registered deemed-compliant FFI (other than a reporting Model 1 FFI, sponsored FFI, or nonreporting IGA FFI covered in Part XII). See instructions.

options.label: Territory financial institution. Complete Part XVII.
options.value: Territory financial institution. Complete Part XVII.

options.label: Excepted nonfinancial group entity. Complete Part XVIII.
options.value: Excepted nonfinancial group entity. Complete Part XVIII.

options.label: Excepted nonfinancial start-up company. Complete Part XIX.
options.value: Excepted nonfinancial start-up company. Complete Part XIX.

options.label: Excepted nonfinancial entity in liquidation or bankruptcy. Complete Part XX.
options.value: Excepted nonfinancial entity in liquidation or bankruptcy. Complete Part XX.

options.label: Certified deemed-compliant nonregistering local bank. Complete Part V.
options.value: Certified deemed-compliant nonregistering local bank. Complete Part V.

options.label: Certified deemed-compliant FFI with only low-value accounts. Complete Part VI.
options.value: Certified deemed-compliant FFI with only low-value accounts. Complete Part VI.

options.label: Certified deemed-compliant sponsored, closely held investment vehicle. Complete Part VII.
options.value: Certified deemed-compliant sponsored, closely held investment vehicle. Complete Part VII.

options.label: Publicly traded NFFE or NFFE affiliate of a publicly traded corporation. Complete Part XXIII.
options.value: Publicly traded NFFE or NFFE affiliate of a publicly traded corporation. Complete Part XXIII.

options.label: Certified deemed-compliant limited life debt investment entity. Complete Part VIII.
options.value: Certified deemed-compliant limited life debt investment entity. Complete Part VIII.

options.label: Excepted territory NFFE. Complete Part XXIV.
options.value: Excepted territory NFFE. Complete Part XXIV.

options.label: Certain investment entities that do not maintain financial accounts. Complete Part IX.
options.value: Certain investment entities that do not maintain financial accounts. Complete Part IX.

options.label: Excepted inter-affiliate FFI. Complete Part XXVII.
options.value: Excepted inter-affiliate FFI. Complete Part XXVII.

options.label: Sponsored direct reporting NFFE. Complete Part XXVIII.
options.value: Sponsored direct reporting NFFE. Complete Part XXVIII.

options.label: Account that is not a financial account.
options.value: Account that is not a financial account.

items.label: 6. Permanent residence address (street, apt. or suite no., or rural route). Do not use a P.O. box or in-care-of address (other than a registered address).
City or town, state or province. Include postal code where appropriate.
Country
7. Mailing address (if different from above)
City or town, state or province. Include postal code where appropriate.
Country
8. U.S. taxpayer identification number (TIN), if required
9a. GIIN
9b. Foreign TIN
9c. Check if FTIN not legally required
10. Reference number(s) (see instructions)

Part II - Disregarded Entity or Branch Receiving Payment. (Complete only if a disregarded entity with a GIIN or a branch of an FFI in a country other than the FFI’s country of residence. See instructions.)
11. Chapter 4 Status (FATCA status) of disregarded entity or branch receiving payment
12. Address of disregarded entity or branch (street, apt. or suite no., or rural route). Do not use a P.O. box or in-care-of address (other than a registered address).
City or town, state or province. Include postal code where appropriate.
Country
13. GIIN (if any)
Part III - Certification and Electronic Signature

NOTE: Submitting this form will populate a PDF version of the W-8 BEN form and send it to you by email for electronic signature, read the certification instructions in W-8 by visiting www.irs.gov/FormW8

options.value: I certify that I have the capacity to sign for the person identified on line 1 of this form.
options.label: I certify that I have the capacity to sign for the person identified on line 1 of this form.

items.label: Your email address
Submit
